description: Triangle of coefficients of polynomials arising in connection with enumeration of intransitive trees by number of nodes and number of right nodes.
references: A. Postnikov, Intransitive Trees, J. Combin. Theory Ser A 79 (1997), 360-366.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Antonio G. Astudillo (afg_astudillo(AT)lycos.com), Mar 23 2003
